attributes.action: Women to be tested for natural killer cells along with NHS recurrent miscarriage tests or at least after a minimum of 5 losses
attributes.additional_details: I have read countless storys now of natural killer cells which are in everyone but sadly some women's levels are higher than others & they see a pregnancy as a threat and so attack the un-born baby. It's 1 simple test to check for this condition and quite easy to treat if found but it isn't offered enough to women out there going through this heartache,  some women have gone into double figures of losses before seeking private help and this condition being found. It should be set in the NHS recurrent miscarriage range of tests or at least preformed after 4 or 5 losses.

rejection.details: Please see: Women to be offered testing after 2 miscarriages
